metadata.title: CVE-2024-35992 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  phy: marvell: a3700-comphy: Fix out of bounds read  There is an out of bounds read access of 'gbe_phy_init_fix[fix_idx].addr' every iteration after 'fix_idx' reaches 'ARRAY_SIZE(gbe_phy_init_fix)'.  Make sure 'gbe_phy_init[addr]' is used when all elements of 'gbe_phy_init_fix' array are handled.  Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.
